description: Design and development of a custom CRM solution for the real estate agency. Complete project management: frontend (Next.js 16, shadcn/ui), backend (Fastify 5 on Bun, Drizzle ORM), database (PostgreSQL, Supabase Auth/Storage), hosting and deployment. Full V2 refactoring with Feature-Sliced Design architecture. Implementation of automation features and AI integration for prospecting.

Information Technology expert training with specialization in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. Learning machine learning, deep learning, NLP and development of complex software architectures through project-based pedagogy.

Creation of a micro-business to offer freelance web development services. Development of a centralization platform and creation of Telegram bots for an influencer in affiliation. Project currently on standby to focus on work-study program and studies.
